talk.chat:
Magister Xenovia:
There is no way that I'll teach you any Dark Elven magic. I would consider teaching some other kills, but I'm very busy right now. Why don't you come back laster?

Magister Genovia:
True, there's a lot of clamoring these days about the return of Shilen. Those claiming to be her "children" stir up trouble everywhere, it seems. Yes, we Dark Elves call ourselves her children as well, but not in the same sense. In fact, I have been tasked by our Elders with silencing those others before they cause even more problems for our people.
I am not skilled in using weapons, but I have some other useful skills...
Learn skills.
Ask about Skill Transfer.
Ask about Skill Enchanting.
Quest
